content: Take your next leap with us, we’re a design studio with over 10 years of experience crafting delightful user experiences for start-ups, founders and established brands and businesses.
Elevate your product market fit and connect with your ideal customer base. We’re here to assist you with wireframes to full-fidelity designs, every step along the way.

testimonials.name: Alex Johnson
testimonials.title: CEO, Tech Innovators Inc.
testimonials.testimonial: JAG Aesthetic transformed our online presence with their expert web design and development services. Their attention to detail and commitment to excellence resulted in a stunning website that has significantly boosted our customer engagement.

testimonials.name: Maria Lopez
testimonials.title: Marketing Director, Fashion Forward
testimonials.testimonial: The consultation and strategy services provided by JAG Aesthetic were invaluable. Their team offered insightful advice and a clear roadmap that helped us achieve our digital marketing goals efficiently and effectively.

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.title: Owner, Thompson Retail
testimonials.testimonial: Our e-commerce platform built by JAG Aesthetic is both powerful and user-friendly. The seamless payment integration and advanced features have greatly improved our sales and customer satisfaction. We couldn't be happier with the results.

contact.slogan: We get it. Making a decision like this is hard. Enter your  email below and we'll send you a deck of work to help you make a decision.

questions.question: How quickly can you start?
questions.answer: Once we've had our kick-off call, we can get started on the same day. Send your request in and we'll get you up and running and started on your project.

questions.question: What if I don't like the designs?
questions.answer: We're pretty easy-going and can correct course quickly. We'll work with you and your team to make sure that we'll get to the right solution as quick as possible.

questions.question: Why not hire a designer?
questions.answer: Hiring a full-time designer can be costly and time-consuming. With JAG Aesthetic, you get access to a team of experts without the overhead of a full-time employee. Plus, we offer a wide range of services and packages tailored to your specific needs, ensuring you get the best value and expertise for your project.

questions.question: How much design work will I get?
questions.answer: The amount of design work you receive depends on the package or service you choose. Our packages outline the scope of work, including the number of design revisions and deliverables. For a la carte services, we'll work with you to define the scope based on your specific needs.

questions.question: What platforms do you specialize in?
questions.answer: We specialize in Strapi and Next.js, providing robust backend solutions and dynamic, responsive frontend designs. Our expertise ensures that your project is built on a solid foundation with modern technologies.

questions.question: Can you handle e-commerce projects?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our Advanced E-commerce Development Package is designed specifically for comprehensive e-commerce solutions, including payment integration, inventory management, and customer segmentation.

questions.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer Maintenance and Support Plans to keep your website up-to-date, secure, and performing optimally. Our plans range from basic monthly updates to comprehensive support with priority assistance.

questions.question: How do you ensure the security of my website?
questions.answer: We prioritize security in all our projects. Using Strapi for the backend allows us to implement robust security measures, including API security enhancements. Additionally, our Maintenance and Support Plans include regular security updates to keep your site protected.

questions.question: What is the process for getting started?
questions.answer: The process begins with an initial consultation where we discuss your project requirements and goals. Following this, we create a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and costs. Once approved, we have a kick-off call to start the project.

questions.question: Can you help with website optimization and SEO?
questions.answer: Yes, our Website Audit and Optimization service includes a comprehensive review of your site for performance improvements, SEO enhancements, and user experience optimizations to ensure your website is efficient and ranks well in search engines.
